mapper.insert: INSERT INTO USERS (ID, NICKNAME, PW, NAME, MOBILE, GENDER, BIRTH_YEAR, BIRTH_DAY, POSTCODE, ROAD_ADDRESS, JIBUN_ADDRESS, DETAIL_ADDRESS, EXTRA_ADDRESS, JOIN_DATE, AGREE_CODE, SNS_TYPE, SESSION_ID, SESSION_LIMIT_DATE, EMAIL, AGE, PW_MODIFY_DATE, INFO_MODIFY_DATE) VALUES (#{id}, #{nickname}, #{pw}, #{name}, #{mobile}, #{gender}, #{birthYear}, #{birthDay}, #{postCode}, #{roadAddress}, #{jibunAddress}, #{detailAddress}, #{extraAddress}, DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%y/%m/%d'), #{agreeCode}, NULL, NULL, NULL, #{email}, (DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y') - #{birthYear} + 1), DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%y/%m/%d'), DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%y/%m/%d'))
INSERT INTO USERS_ACCESS (ID, LAST_LOGIN_DATE) VALUES (#{id}, NOW())
INSERT INTO USERS_RETIRE (ID, JOIN_DATE, RETIRE_DATE) VALUES (#{id}, #{joinDate}, NOW())
